Format a problem/solution into markdown with figures and tables

Source: R/compile_problem.R
format_problem.Rd

Format a problem/solution into markdown with figures and tables

Usage

format_problem(prob, pts = NULL, spacer = "")

format_solution(prob)

Arguments

prob

a fully compiled problem.

pts

optional number of points.

spacer

string to be passed through to all_questions()/all_solutions().

Examples

format_problem(simple_prop(seed=1))
#> In a survey of 26 people, 1 people said "yes" to a particular question. What proportion of the people said "yes"?
format_solution(simple_prop(seed=1))
#> The proportion is $\frac{1}{26} = 0.038$.
